post.text: Karnataka govt announces scrapping of NEP, plans to formulate state-specific education policy

comments.text: Constitution is safe when Congress gets to have it their way.
This news is sad in so many ways. They want fight.
If NEP is  scrapped then Karnataka students will have no scope in rest of India.  Politicians  must be careful.
